titles.title: Taxpayers Second Amendment Protection Act of 2016
To prohibit restrictions on possession, storage, or use of firearms in Federal programs, and for other purposes.
Taxpayers Second Amendment Protection Act of 2016

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, Homeland Security, and Investigations.

bill.summary:
Taxpayers Second Amendment Protection Act of 2016
This bill prohibits a federal official or entity from restricting, or imposing a condition on, the lawful possession, storage, or use of a firearm by an individual who is assisted under a federal or federally funded program.
